title: Panel Design Engineer
summary: Apple is looking for a world-class Thin Film Transistor (TFT) panel design engineer to design, develop and launch the next TFT technologies for the portable, laptop and desktop displays in Apple products.
description:
TFT panel architecture scoping and definition
TFT pixel and panel design, layout and parasitic parameter extraction
TFT pixel and panel modeling, characterization, and validation
Failure mode analysis, root cause investigation, and problem solving for mass-production display development
New TFT technology exploration, investigation, and validation
Collaboration with cross-functional teams, including TFT process, Optics, Touch designers, Silicon designers, Mechanical Engineering and Product Design
Collaboration with external vendors for display manufacturing
International business travel to support project implementation
key_qualifications:
-  Strong command of Electrical Engineering fundamentals (analog/digital circuit design)
-  Experience with SPICE/Cadence modeling and simulation required
-  Experience/in-depth technical knowledge of displays or related electronics preferred
-  Experience in display pixel, gate driver designs preferred
-  Understanding of Thin-Film Transistors and panel process preferred
-  Experience in characterizing panel optical and electrical performance preferred
-  Experience in designing and manufacturing high-volume display products is preferred
-  Excellent written and verbal communication skills required
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience
